participant_1.name: Alexis
participant_1.personality: Mysterious and innovative, often lost in thought but passionate about gaming.
participant_1.background: i'm a famous twitch streamer. i am a recluse. i helped design the game starcraft. i'm working on a building a robot to be my body double. i have an allergy to water.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Energetic and sociable, always looking for ways to stay active and keep things interesting.
participant_2.background: eating is something i do when i'm bored. i go to the gym regularly. i have short hair. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. two dogs live with me.
